author: Source: Witney Gazette
title: Claudio Ranieri praises Riyad Mahrez's part in winning goal - Witney Gazette
text:
Jamie Vardy grabbed the headlines with Leicester's winning goal against Crystal Palace but the contribution of Riyad Mahrez was not lost on City boss Claudio Ranieri. Vardy's 59th-minute strike, his 10th goal of the season, saw him join Ruud van Nistelrooy, Daniel Sturridge, Mark Stein, Ian Wright, Alan Shearer, Thierry Henry and Emmanuel Adebayor as the only players to score in seven consecutive Barclays Premier League matches.
 Witney Gazette.
